Uses of Package
com.telenav.kivakit.commandline

Packages that use com.telenav.kivakit.commandline
Package
Description
com.telenav.kivakit.commandline
 
com.telenav.kivakit.commandline.parsing
 
  • Classes in com.telenav.kivakit.commandline used by com.telenav.kivakit.commandline
    Class
    Description
    ApplicationMetadataTrait
    Application metadata used in formulating command line usage help.
    ArgumentParser
    Parses a command-line ArgumentValue, as defined by a Quantifier, a type, a string converter for that type and a human-readable description.
    ArgumentParser.Builder
    A fluent builder for argument parsers.
    ArgumentValue
    The string value of a single argument in a command line.
    ArgumentValueList
    A list of ArgumentValues passed on a command line and retrieved with CommandLine.argumentValues() after command line parsing with CommandLineParser.
    CommandLine
    A parsed command line of switches and (non-switch) arguments.
    CommandLineParser
    Parses an array of command line arguments into a list of SwitchValueList of the form "-switch=value" and a list of remaining non-switch arguments in an ArgumentValueList.
    Quantifier
    Specifies the number of arguments required or allowed
    SwitchParser
    A switch parser that can be passed to CommandLine.get(SwitchParser) to retrieve a switch value.
    SwitchParser.Builder
    A fluent builder for argument parsers.
    SwitchValue
    Not public API
  • Classes in com.telenav.kivakit.commandline used by com.telenav.kivakit.commandline.parsing
    Class
    Description
    ArgumentParser
    Parses a command-line ArgumentValue, as defined by a Quantifier, a type, a string converter for that type and a human-readable description.
    ArgumentValueList
    A list of ArgumentValues passed on a command line and retrieved with CommandLine.argumentValues() after command line parsing with CommandLineParser.
    SwitchParser
    A switch parser that can be passed to CommandLine.get(SwitchParser) to retrieve a switch value.
    SwitchValueList
    Not Public API
